title: Ep. 251: The Mother-Daughter Beauty Bond with Kimora Lee Simmons
itunes:title: Ep. 251: The Mother-Daughter Beauty Bond with Kimora Lee Simmons
itunes:subtitle: The founder of Baby Phat, Kimora Lee Simmons, talks about the beauty collection she created with her daughters, Ming and Aoki; why beauty can be a bonding ritual; her thoughts on tattoos and plastic surgery (especially when it comes to her kids); and h...
description:
The founder of Baby Phat, Kimora Lee Simmons, talks about the beauty collection she created with her daughters, Ming and Aoki; why beauty can be a bonding ritual; her thoughts on tattoos and plastic surgery (especially when it comes to her kids); and how to raise girls in the age of social media. Tune in for an open, honest conversation that’s filled with fabulosity. -- Want more of our beauty podcast? Episode recap, notes, and product links: fatmascara.com/blog; Our Private Facebook Group: Fat Mascara / Raising a Wand; Instagram: @fatmascara, @jessicamatlin, @jenn_edit; Twitter: @fatmascara; Email: info@fatmascara.com; To Leave a Voicemail & Be Featured on a Future Episode: 646-481-8182.

Become a member at https://plus.acast.com/s/fatmascara.


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
